title: Create GitHub issue and PR templates
description:
Add .github/ templates for consistent community contributions.

**Issue templates:**
- Bug report (steps to reproduce, expected vs actual, environment)
- Feature request (problem, proposed solution, alternatives)
- Question/support

**PR template:**
- Description of changes
- Related issue link
- Testing done
- Checklist (docs updated, tests added, etc.)
definitionOfDone: Bug report template with environment checklist
